attributes.action: Make autism awareness mandatory In mainstream schools
attributes.background: As a mother of girls on the autistic spectrum having no choice but to attend mainstream schools want more awareness made mandatory across mainstream primary and secondary schools

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we are not sure if you would like mandatory training for staff and support workers in schools, or if you would like autism awareness to be taught to children as part of the national curriculum. 
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
